title: Time: A love story coloured by incarceration
description: Garrett Bradley may become the first black director to win an Oscar for her first feature documentary.

title: Covid-19 vaccines: What's happening to unused jabs?
description: Surplus vaccine doses are piling up in some countries while others say they are not getting enough.

title: The disabled doctors not believed by their colleagues
description: People often feel nervous when they visit a doctor, but what if you are a doctor but your colleagues don't believe you're ill?

title: Teenage blacksmith Ben Perkins forges social media following
description: Ben Perkins built a blacksmith's forge in his back garden and taught himself the traditional craft.

title: 'Absolutely disgusting, bang out of order' - MOTD2 pundits discuss European Super League plans
description: Match of the Day 2 pundits Danny Murphy and Dion Dublin discuss the news that six Premier League clubs have agreed to join a new European Super League.

title: Handcuffed, blindfolded and beaten on Libya's front line
description: Special correspondent Feras Kilani on what it's been like to cover the 10 years since Colonel Gaddafi was deposed and killed.

title: European Super League: 'I'm disappointed and disgusted' - Danny Murphy
description: Former Liverpool and Tottenham midfielder Danny Murphy explains why he cannot see any positives from plans for a breakaway European Super League involving England's 'big six' clubs.

title: 'A chance to create history' - Leicester reach first FA Cup final since 1969 - highlights & report
description: Leicester City boss Brendan Rodgers says his side have "the chance to create history" after reaching their first FA Cup final since 1969 at the expense of Southampton at Wembley.

title: Surrey cyclist's 5,000-mile challenge inspired by barefoot walk

title: Plane ditches in ocean during Florida airshow
description: The World War Two-era aircraft made an emergency landing in shallow water.

title: Greensill row: Ministers 'will look at' lobbying rules proposals

title: Indianapolis FedEx shooting: Who were the eight victims?
description: Four of the eight who died at a FedEx warehouse were members of the Sikh community.

title: Prince Philip's funeral: 13.6 million watch ceremony in UK
description: Millions more around the world watch the service across online channels, including YouTube.

title: Mars helicopter first flight: Nasa to test Ingenuity
description: Ingenuity is set to be the first rotorcraft to fly on another planet. This is how it'll work.

title: Putin critic Navalny 'will not be allowed to die in prison'
description: Russia's ambassador to the UK says opposition leader Alexei Navalny's medical treatment will be "taken care of".

title: Helen McCrory was 'meteor in our life', says husband Damian Lewis
description: The Peaky Blinders star's husband Damian Lewis says she armed her family with "courage to go on".

title: Charles Geschke: Adobe co-founder who helped develop the PDF dies
description: Charles Geschke set up Adobe in 1982, giving the world the ubiquitous PDF technology.

title: Covid in Scotland: 'Mistake' to discharge Covid patients says Sturgeon
description: Nicola Sturgeon says moving people from hospital to care homes at the start of the pandemic was an error in hindsight.

title: Covid: Gig with no social distancing to be part of government pilot
description: Ticket-holders for the outdoor concert in Liverpool will have to provide a negative test beforehand.

title: Salisbury poisoning suspects 'linked to Czech blast'
description: The Czech Republic expels 18 Russian diplomats after linking the operatives to a 2014 explosion.

title: China and US pledge climate change commitment
description: The US and China announced actions to tackle climate change following meetings in Shanghai last week.

title: YouTube star wins with knockout inside two minutes
description: YouTube star-turned-boxer Jake Paul wins his fight with ex-UFC fighter Ben Askren with a first-round knockout inside two minutes.

title: Midsomer Murders: The county that hopes a police show will lure back visitors
description: "I thought it would be nice to find the places it was filmed - I used to go out most weekends."

title: Litter: The Merthyr Tydfil teenager fighting the fly-tippers
description: Daniel Lewis was so frustrated with fly-tippers, he started cleaning his home town's streets himself.

title: Russia Ukraine conflict: Fact-checking Russian TV's Ukraine claims
